data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module will send a packet to an NTP server, get the response,
    then return information based on the server's response. This can be
    used to monitor the NTP server or set a local clock based upon the
    NTP server's response. It was designed with portability in mind. So,
    on could send, receive, and capture information from the NTP server
    *without* the need to have NTP command line utilities available on
    the system.
